name: Humerous
description:
The game contains some spooky and disturbing imagery. 

Viewer discretion is advised!!

It's the season of Halloween and you've just finished attending a party that your co-worker dragged you in.  As the party's finished, and your co-worker bailing early, you just remembered that your car was busted because of your friend that's been living with you for a good while now. Completely over it, you decide to just say screw it, and walk back home. You're sure that nothing can go wrong....! 

....To an extent.

Humerous is a  short, spooky, Halloween-themed game that was made for the RPG Makers! Discord "Spooky, Scary" Game Jam that takes around an hour or more to finish. The game has 7 endings total, and some contain same endings of different dialogue variants.

Dev's Note: The game was made under a month, though even with double checking to ensure there wasn't any bugs, they still might be possible to pop up every now and then. Also important to note that English is not my first language, so grammar might be weird to some.

CONTENT WARNING: 

  • Disturbing imagery
  • Death
  • Gore
  • Murder
  • Depression
  • Self-Deprecation

If you enjoyed the game, consider checking out my  future projects and socials! Here's is the link that leads you to my other links, pretty neat huh? https://intothedeepvoid.carrd.co
